title: Dame of Diamonds
description:
Mask design assignment where we were instructed to make a pattern by repeating a shape. Created by making the pattern using the diamond shape in adobe illustrator and clipping the design into the shape of the mask in photoshop.
Awarded a Scholastic Honorable Mention in the graphic design category in 2022.

title: Love Shot
description:
Poster design assignment where we were exploring creating volume and color schemes through icons to represent a song. I chose the song 'Love Shot' by EXO and made different verisons of the poster through exploring different color harmony and layering formatts using adobe illustrator features. 
Awarded a Scholastic Honorable Mention in the graphic design category in 2022.

title: Clothing Merch Design
description:
Sweatshirt and hat design created for épée fencers where the accent marks are designed in the shape of fencing swords. Currenting in the process of working with my fencing club to produce this merch.
Personal project created on adobe illustrator.

title: Jellyfish
description: One of my first and favorite graphic design assignment where we took a conjuntion and created a poster that uses the silhouette of one part of the word to create the other part. I learned basic illustrator drawing tools through this assignment.

title: Angry Pig Game
description: Design of a game that plays a twist on the original 'Angry Bird' game. This assignment allowed me to develope illustrator skills like typography, vector graphics, and color modes.
alt: Game design twist on the game Angry Bird.

title: Beats of Bethany Logo
description: This is a logo I designed for Beats of Bethany using illustrator. Beats of Bethany is a non-profit organization I co-founded and played an active role in as the director throughout middle and high school. We serve senior homes, low income youth, & women in shelters by empowering youth in the Oregon-Washington area by helping underserved communities and cultivating a volunteer culture. Find us on instagram @beatsofbethany!
alt: Logo I designed for my non-profit.

title: Peppermint Coco
description: Cup holder design piece where we explored importing hand drawings into adobe illstrator to explore incorporating digital and hand drawn elements into one design.

title: The Persistence of Time
description:
Acrylic painting piece that was inspired by the famous painting 'The Persistence of Memory' that explores how technology has evolved through time.
Awarded a Scholastic Silver Key in the painting category in 2021.
alt: Physical painting inspired by the classics.

title: Spiderman Alter-Ego
description: Alter-ego assignment in VIS 2 where we were supposed to design an alter-ego of yourself so I decided to design myself if I were in the spider verse. This design was sketched out on procreate. Received full marks on this.

title: The Giving Lotus
description:
Final assignment in VIS 2 where we were supposed to plan and design a physical installation. Used procreate to sketch out a lo-fi of the installation blueprint. Received full marks on this assignment.
Link to the full write up project proposal: https://docs.google.com/document/d/10Hm9TwEd0otFmZciOH8Z8h9M3wUh0djKC58F1yHJzIA/edit?usp=sharing

title: 紫
description:
VIS 2 moving image assignment where we were instructed to create an experimental film. Used adobe premiere to complete the editing. Received full marks on this assignment.
Link to the video: https://youtu.be/EA3MdWGyHL0
